page.title: 07THE PRECINCT AT HADSTON
page.content: Our precinct at Hadston is fairly big,it has many shops which consist of a co-op,hairdressing salon,fish and chip shop,betting office,newsagent clothes shop greengrocer,baker,a shop for the hire of video films,butcher, and a post office. Above the precinct there are flats which house many people.There is alsoa car park for those people who live in the flats and for the shoppers.This car park is usually busy because the parking is free. Although the precinct is very useful for a small community like Hadston,it could be kept tidier.The public conveniences are covered in graffiti and are very unhygenic. Attached to the precinct there is a community centre which is used for different activities and sports e.g. playschool,judo,keepfit and dancing.
